synopsis.text: Hoshifuru Koi no Astrolabe, a beloved otome game, becomes the unexpected reality for an overworked office employee after her untimely death. Reincarnated as the game's antagonist, Diana, she faces a daunting challenge: prevent the game's bad ending that results in the world's destruction. With Prince Sirius, a central character, showing interest in her, Diana decides to seduce him in hopes of being rejected. However, her plan backfires when the prince finds himself falling in love with her instead. As the villainess-turned-heroine, can she maintain her newfound romance while averting the impending doom? Experience the thrilling journey of love and rediscovery in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
